Uses of Interface
sorcer.falcon.base.Conditional

Packages that use Conditional
sorcer.falcon.core.exertion   
 

Uses of Conditional in sorcer.falcon.core.exertion
 

Classes in sorcer.falcon.core.exertion that implement Conditional
 class IfExertion
          The IfExertion implements the Conditional interface.
 class WhileExertion
          WhileExertion is a new exertion extending from the ServiceExertion and also implements the Conditional interface .
 

Fields in sorcer.falcon.core.exertion declared as Conditional
protected  Conditional WhileExertion.condition
          This is the reference to the condition component, when the condition is given.
 

Methods in sorcer.falcon.core.exertion that return Conditional
 Conditional WhileExertion.getCondition()
          Returns the condition component, which is an object implementing the Conditional interface for this looping exertion.
 

Constructors in sorcer.falcon.core.exertion with parameters of type Conditional
IfExertion(Conditional condition, Exertion thenExertion, Exertion elseExertion)
          Overloaded constructor which takes two exertions and an object implementing the Conditional interface.
WhileExertion(Conditional condition, Exertion baseExertion)
          Overloaded constructor which takes in a Conditional condition component and an Exertion.
